alert.note: Alert for Crisp; Dooly; Macon; Sumter (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 19 at 12:16PM EDT by NWS Atlanta
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of south central Macon, western Dooly, eastern Sumter and northwestern Crisp Counties through 1245 PM EDT... At 1216 PM EDT, a strong thunderstorm was near Huntington, or near Americus, moving east at 10 mph. HAZARD...40 to 50 mph wind, frequent cloud to ground lightning and heavy rain. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect minor damage to tree limbs and blowing around of light, unsecured objects. Heavy rain may cause temporary street flooding especially in poor drainage areas. Locations impacted include... Americus, Byromville, Leslie, Lilly, De Soto, Dooling, Lamar, New Era, Flint River Wma, Huntington, Pennington, Drayton and Methvins. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: People outdoors should seek shelter immediately. If you can hear thunder, you are close enough to be struck by lightning. Motorists should slow down and be prepared for possible loss of control due to hydroplaning.
